entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
